description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

kfl_main.description:
This version was released on July 23 in the Manual Discord. If you grabbed the latest version from there, you already have this version. Remember that this will not work if the .apworld is not in the custom_worlds folder!

NOTE: Do not download the source code. Just grab the .apworld and .yaml files.
kfl_main.title: Initial Version

kfl_main-1-0-1.description: This manual was updated to work on AP 0.5.1 and on the newest version of Manual Unstable, as well as fixed logic issues regarding Storage Mouth in A Trip to Alivel Mall (Storage Mouth should have been required to reach the Capsule in the room with the solution to the second maze, as well as at the point that you get credit for exploring the mall without getting lost).
kfl_main-1-0-1.title: KFL Manual version 1.0.1

kfl_main-1-0-2.description: This fixes a compatibility issue with Universal Tracker, allowing the tracker to work with this game. UT was having issues with how items get removed via hooks. May need to look at locations in the future.
kfl_main-1-0-2.title: KFL Manual version 1.0.2

kfl_main_1-0-3.description:
Fixed syntax on options.json. Now not only will the yaml for this game properly generate from ArchipelagoLauncher.exe -> Generate Template Options (I still provide it anyway here), but this fixed another issue with Universal Tracker, this time UT was assuming the player had access to Lab Discovera after beating Clawroline.

I am also aware that the tracker is counting items twice in terms of category. As this will get fixed in the next Unstable release of Manual, it will be fixed alongside other changes I will need to make once the next unstable comes out.
kfl_main_1-0-3.title: KFL Manual version 1.0.3
